settings.code:
What’s the fastest way to see meaningful longevity results? Three cycles of Prolon 5-Day. A groundbreaking new study published in Nature Communications, a prestigious Nature portfolio journal, suggests that three cycles of Prolon’s Fasting Mimicking Diet (FMD) over three consecutive months could have a major impact on your biological age score.

According to the study, completing just three FMD cycles was associated with an average 2.5 year decrease in biological age score.

Order Now

The study also confirms our recommendation to follow Prolon 5-Day for three consecutive cycles (or once a month for three months) when beginning a lifestyle program that is intended to support your overall health.

Order Now

settings.title: Prolon 5-Day Program

settings.product_description:
Prolon was designed and clinically tested by 18 global universities to nourish your body while inducing the cellular, metabolic, and emotional benefits of prolonged fasting. In three 5-day cycles of ProLon, you can fuel your body into rejuvenation, longevity, and healthy living.


  • Metabolic health
  • Cellular Rejuvenation
  • Fat-focused weight loss
  • Changed relationship with food
  • Best results & successful transformations
  • Limited Time — Free gift of L-Pill with purchase Learn More

settings.sub_title: The clinically tested system for healthier, rejuvenating fasting
